name: Suspicious Candy Shells
desc: Candies in a variety of different shapes. The powdered sugar coating has a grainy texture, reminiscent of grit trapped in an oyster's shell. Perhaps only those willing to battle through the coarseness of this coating will earn the right to enjoy the spoils within â€” sweet candy.

value.text: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
